Keywords: Amazon , Teen Titans , Warrior
Real Name: Donna Troy
Special Powers
CHAMPION OF THEMYSCIRA: WONDER WOMAN'S BRACELETS: Donna Troy may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped. // If Donna Troy is equipped with WW80 #s005 Wonder Woman's Bracelets, when she is targeted with a range attack increase the result of her Super Senses roll by an additional +1.
TITANS REBORN: When Donna Troy is given a MOVE action, after resolutions she can use the Titans team ability as FREE.

I like her overall damage output in an Era where damage is harder to manipulate. 3 damage down the whole dial with late dial CCE provides her an 11 attack with 4 damage in close attacks. Plus you can make use out of your WW equipment for free.
